ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] What does this mean????
ygData.msgSnippet: It says your will is not sufficient to command this weapon and it means you are not high enough level for your weapon to cast its particular proc(ess). If
ygData.messageBody:
It says "your will is not sufficient to command this weapon" and it means
you are not high enough level for your weapon to "cast" its particular
proc(ess).

If the mace you happen to be wielding is a Screaming Mace, it begins
proccing when you reach level 10, and the proc is a temporary increase in
strength similar to the cleric spell Yaulp.

Not too bad of a weapon at lower levels.

Froondor, 43 Wood Elf Druid of Tarew Marr.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@...>
To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, July 22, 2002 12:05 PM
Subject: [EverQuest] What does this mean????


> Hi again everyone!
>
> Yesterday I was playing Genmay, my Gnome Warrior and I'm using a
> mace as my weapon. I kept getting a message saying something like my
> will isn't right to command this weapon. What does that mean? That I'm
> not able to use it or more specifically my class doesn't wield this
> weapon as well as others? Heck I seemed to be kicking some butt with it
> as my hits were ranking between 12-16 points each. Any ideas?
>
>
>
